teams.name: Yunus Social Business
teams.loan_because:
"A charity dollar has only one life. A Social Business dollar can be invested over and over again." 
- Professor Muhammad Yunus
teams.description: This team passionately supports YSB's initiatives to empower social businesses across the world.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because:
"A man filled with the love of God
is not content with blessing his 
family alone, but ranges through 
the whole world, anxious to bless 
the whole human race."

- Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Scharlet's Web
teams.loan_because: We recently read 'Half the Sky' and feel empowered that by pooling our small investments, we can create big impacts in the lives of people working to better their lives for themselves and their families.
teams.description: Scharlet's Web is a bookgroup that has been meeting monthly since 1994.  We are named after one of our original members who died of ovarian cancer about a year after we began meeting.  We gather to share our love of books, to laugh, and support each other through love, compassion and humor.

teams.name: Women of Southlake and Beyond
teams.loan_because: To those to whom much is given, much must be given.
teams.description:
Things great have small beginnings. Every downpour is a raindrop; Every fire is just a spark; Every harvest is just a seed; Every journey is just a step because without that step there will be no journey; Without that raindrop there can be no shower; Without that seed there can be no harvest.
William Wilberforce

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !
